helloldap.server¶

The server.

class helloldap.server.Server[source]¶

Bases: object

This is the actual server.

After instantiation, but before calling run(), set these properties:

  • ‘lgg’: Instance of a logger
  • ‘rc’: Instance of the dict with configuration

After run() was called, property ‘app’ will contain the instance of the web application.

run()[source]¶

Run until interrupted with CTRL-C.

setup_routes()[source]¶
